title: Defense Attorney

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, select a player. You will defend them from any prison sentences, meaning that if they would be affected by a Jailor-like ability at any point from now on, they are not affected by it. Additionally, you may defend them from anyone attempting to investigate their role by causing their role to appear as though it is a different role of your choice while they are alive, affecting every ability or attribute that returns information based on their role, including public reveals.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Only one player can be affected by your ability at a time. If you select a different player while having selected another player previously, the effect wears off of the previous player.
- The effects of your ability will occur even if you are dead.

desc:
Post 1920
*Your honor, my client is innocent. My evidence lies here in this briefcase full of money.*
